page.title: 22Old Trafford Cricket Ground
page.content:
The wall under the trees was replaced by a wrought iron fence (except the corner with the painted sign)

Test match status was removed from Old Trafford in 2008 as it requires redevelopment.

The ground is being redeveloped as part of a deal involving Tesco.

Out door music concerts are held there including bands such as Foo Fighter, The Strokes, Madness, Green Day, Artic Monkies, Bon Jovi,

The Metrolink tram not trains now run along the railway line behind the ground.

The original photo looks like it may have been taken from a building which was a Midland Bank.

Just to the left of the picture a new office was built for Kellog's


Contribution by: Joe Murray
